column1: ReactFunctComps,Using Redux,"Update the code below so you create a component that updates the data contained on a reducer that will receive the action type ""Deposit"", and the payload 10 (number, not string).
For storing the data, the reducer uses the property ""balance"", that is also how we refer to the total amount deposited.
